name: Hotel Reef Yucatan - All Inclusive & Convention Center

reviews.text: First, I cannot comment on the rooms just the amenities as we visited this resort as part of a shore excursion from our cruise.
reviews.title: Skip it

reviews.text: It was clear that we were the only people there, I saw no other guests. So if you are staying here for your vacation be prepared to be regularly invaded by cruise ship passengers. It is also not a very big resort, we pretty much over ran the place.
reviews.title: Overall pretty good.

reviews.text: The beach is OK. The water is not quite the clear Caribbean waters I would have liked and the sand is very coarse and full of sea shells so wear your flip flops. The kids enjoyed playing in the water and a kayak ride. The beach is secluded which is nice. There are only a couple of huts for shade, so if you didn't get out there first you're out of luck. There were no beach umbrellas available at all.
reviews.title: No Bueno!

reviews.text: The pool was clean but very basic (no slides or other attractions). The staff did set up several games in the pool which everyone enjoyed. The staff was extremely attentive and the facilities were very clean.
reviews.title: Yuck

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food however was very mediocre and the drinks were downright awful.
reviews.title: We had a great day here.

aka: Hotel Reef Yucatan - All Inclusive And Convention Center
